CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 28, 1957, page A13, reads: "Roy Gets the 'Pitch' - Pittsburgh's own Roy Eldridge gets the 'pitch' - and not for his famous trumpet this time - but on how Pittsburgh women are getting the new ' slim look' these days at Slender. Belle's Slenderizing Salon. Roy took time out after his recent appearance in 'Jazz at the Philharmonic' concert to visit his friends on the salon's staff. From all appearances he was easily and quickly sold on the method by the personnel shown here, including, left to right: Beverly Pope, technician: Gladys Miller, assistant manager; Genevieve Still, technician, and Lola Berg, manager. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Beverly Pope, Gladys Miller, Genevieve Still, musician Roy Eldridge, and Lola Berg, looking at open book in interior with painting of female figures
CatSubject_tab: Eldridge, Roy, 1911-1989.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Interiors--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Pope, Beverly.Miller, Gladys.Still, Genevieve.Berg, Lola.
